Note to myself. Use the file.info function to move only recently changed files.

## Get stash-yaml

```{r prelims}
library(dplyr)
library(glue)
library(knitr)
library(magrittr)
library(readr)
library(stringr)
library(yaml)
load("../data/file_headers.RData")
```


```{r write-tag-files}
file_headers %>%
  filter(names=="tags") %>%
  count(values) %>%
  arrange(values) -> tags
tags$values %>%
  tolower %>%
  str_replace_all(" ", "-") %>%
  paste0("../text/tags/", ., ".qmd")
list.files()
```
